name: The Summoning Stones of Ratreyjan
description:
Welcome to the store page for The Summoning Stones of Ratreyjan!

An RPG in which the central mechanic is that the main character levels down as the story progresses instead of leveling up! Join the intrepid Female Protagonist as she makes her way to the four corners of the mysterious land of Ratreyjan and awakens the dormant Summoning Stones!

Meet an interesting cast of characters that include: a pirate, a priestess, a mystical old woman, and a man obsessed with books!

The game was an experiment in working with an unusual mechanic that works contrary to the normal standards of a genre. I had a lot of fun making it and I sincerely hope you have fun playing it!
